content.rendered:
Walls of Books in Ellijay!

A Warner Robins couple now owns a Walls of Books franchise in Ellijay, GA. It will open soon, amid the backdrop of the beautiful North Georgia mountains.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We will soon announce another Georgia-based store! Keep reading our updates over the next few weeks. We are expanding nationwide, but we are also growing our Southern presence by leaps and bounds.

“Like” The Athens Facebook Page!

Have you seen the Facebook page for Walls of Books, Athens? It’s filled with quirky wit, shots of the amazing inventory, and bull dog photobombs. Like and share their page and you’ll be instrumental in their growth and partners in their journey. Visit them on Facebook now!

excerpt.rendered: A Warner Robins couple now owns a Walls of Books franchise in Ellijay, GA. It will open soon, amid the backdrop of the beautiful North Georgia mountains.
